851500.name: [MARS] Total Warfare - Annual Supervisor upgrade (2020)
851500.description:
This DLC allows full use of

  • everything included in the Player upgrade

and also gives access to:

  • Create a total of three battles, which will be promoted near the top of the list
  • Edit advanced options such as friendly fire and terrain deformation
  • Change advanced battle settings and permissions via the Admin panel
  • Create 30 customized maps, which can be renamed and will be promoted


The upgrade is valid for a minimum of one year from the date of purchase, after which a sustained Player upgrade is granted as long as your credit balance is greater than zero, with the potential to be extended indefinitely by additional credits that you win.
